mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_info ( id , name , nick_name , email , mobile_phone , company , postion , sex , title , address , country , province , city , zip_code , id_code , status , state_date , confirm_number , phone , user_type , user_source , password , open_id , login_source , user_pic, authen_status, token_id ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{name} , #{nickName} , #{email} , #{mobilePhone} , #{company} , #{postion} , #{sex} , #{title} , #{address} , #{country} , #{province} , #{city} , #{zipCode} , #{idCode} , #{status} , #{stateDate} , #{confirmNumber} , #{phone} , #{userType} , #{userSource} , #{password} , #{openId} , #{loginSource} , #{userPic}, #{authenStatus}, #{tokenId} )
